TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSFederationAuthenticationModule extends System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase

summary.span: 是一个 HTTP 模块，它通过在传入请求中强制执行联合身份验证设置来保护 ASP.NET 应用程序。

span.span: The is an HTTP module which is used to secure an ASP.NET application by enforcing federated authentication settings on incoming requests.

summary.span: 是 WIF 提供的现成可用的主要模块，用于在 ASP.NET 应用程序中处理基于声明的标识访问。

span.span: The is the main module that WIF offers out of the box for handling claims-based identity access in ASP.NET applications.

summary.span: 引发几个事件，它允许 ASP.NET 开发人员更改默认行为和控制身份验证和声明处理如何发生的细节。

span.span: The raises several events, which allows ASP.NET developers to change the default behavior and control the details of how authentication and claims processing take place.

summary.span: 功能被分为任务具体的方法。

span.span: The functionality is divided into task-specific methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现一个 HTTP 模块，已知为 WS 联合身份验证模块 (WSFAM)。The class implements an HTTP module known as the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM). WSFAM 被实施了现有的 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF)。The WSFAM is implemented out of the box by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF). WSFAM 为 web.config 文件中创建一项添加到 ASP.NET 管道。The WSFAM is added to the ASP.NET pipeline by making an entry in the web.config file. 它派生，它可以实现。It derives from , which implements . 注册要侦听的 ASP.NET 运行时和事件。It registers with the ASP.NET runtime to listen for the and events. 侦听事件，可让客户端重定向到安全令牌服务 (STS) 获取安全令牌对请求的资源授权失败时 WSFAM。Listening to the event, lets the WSFAM redirect clients to a security token service (STS) to obtain a security token when authorization fails on a requested resource. 侦听事件，WSFAM 监视从 STS 响应，其中包含请求的令牌的 HTTP 请求。Listening to the event enables the WSFAM to monitor HTTP requests for a response from the STS that contains the requested token. 如果此类标记存在且有效，它创建的实例使用存在于令牌的声明身份验证的用户。When such a token is present and valid, it creates an instance of for the authenticated user using the claims that are present in the token. 当使用 WSFAM，由会话身份验证模块 (SAM)，这是一个实例提供会话管理的从其中派生的类。When using the WSFAM, session management is provided by a session authentication module (SAM), which is an instance of the class, or a class derived from it. SAM 也添加到配置文件中的 ASP.NET 管道。The SAM is also added to the ASP.NET pipeline in the configuration file. SAM 监视对身份验证 （会话） cookie 的请求。The SAM monitors requests for authentication (session) cookies. 当这些 cookie 存在并有效时，该模块中提取从身份验证的用户，并设置属性和线程主体属性。When these cookies are present and valid, the module extracts the for the authenticated user from the and sets the property and the thread principal properties. WSFAM 提供：The WSFAM provides: - ASP.NET 应用程序身份验证外包给安全令牌服务 (STS) 使用的 WS 联合身份验证协议的功能。The ability for an ASP.NET application to outsource authentication to a security token service (STS) by using the WS-Federation protocol. 标识可以跨一个或多个身份识别领域联合，并且涉及多个 Sts。Identity can be federated across one or more identity realms and involve multiple STSs. - ASP.NET 应用程序的基于声明的标识。Claims-based identity for ASP.NET applications. 在身份验证，WSFAM 生成从中发送的 STS 的安全令牌的声明主体，并将此声明主体设置线程主体。During authentication, the WSFAM builds a principal from the claims in the security token sent by the STS and sets this claims principal as the thread principal. 然后可以使用此主体以进一步授权、 演示文稿和它所代表的用户的逻辑决定在代码中。You can then use this principal to make further authorization, presentation, and logic decisions about the user it represents in your code. WSFAM 公开提供要在 WS 联合身份验证登录和注销请求中使用的消息参数的默认值的多个属性。The WSFAM exposes several properties that provide default message parameters to use on WS-Federation sign-in and sign-out requests. 这些属性通常从初始化[ <wsFederation> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md)配置文件中的元素。These properties are typically initialized from the [<wsFederation>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md) element in a configuration file. 这些属性的最重要的是：The most important of these properties are: - 属性，用于指定要将 WS 联合身份验证登录和注销请求发送到安全令牌服务 (STS) 的地址。The property, which specifies the address of the security token service (STS) to which to send WS-Federation sign-in and sign-out requests. - 属性，用于在 WS 联合身份验证登录请求中指定要使用的 wtrealm 参数。The property, which specifies the wtrealm parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests. Wtrealm 参数标识信赖方 (RP) 应用程序到 STS 的安全领域。The wtrealm parameter identifies the security realm of the relying party (RP) application to the STS. 登录消息参数还可以更改基于每个请求通过提供一个事件处理程序委托，它为事件。Sign-in message parameters can also be changed on a per-request basis by providing an event-handler delegate for the event. 两个属性控制模块的行为。Two properties control the behavior of the module. 两个属性通常还会初始化从``配置中的元素。Both of these properties are also typically initialized from the `` element in configuration. - 属性指定该模块是否应进行身份验证执行被动重定向到 STS。The property specifies whether the module should perform passive redirects to the STS for authentication. - 属性指定是否应持久会话。The property specifies whether sessions should be persistent. 如果此属性设置为 true，SAM 用于会话 cookie 写入客户端。If this property is set true, the SAM is used to write a session cookie to the client. 在从客户端的后续请求，SAM 提供会话 cookie 中保存使用该令牌进行身份验证。On subsequent requests from the client, the SAM provides authentication by using the token persisted in the session cookie. WSFAM 在登录期间引发几个事件和注销，可供 ASP.NET 开发人员更改模块的默认行为和控制的身份验证和声明处理如何会发生的详细信息。The WSFAM raises several events during sign-in and sign-out, which allow ASP.NET developers to change the default behavior of the module and control the details of how authentication and claims processing take place. WS 联合身份验证登录请求发送到 STS 之前，将引发以下事件：The following events are raised before the WS-Federation sign-in request is sent to the STS: - ： 当启用被动重定向和授权请求的资源上失败时引发。: Raised when passive redirect is enabled and authorization fails on a requested resource. - ： 前一刻引发 WSFAM 发送到 STS WS 联合身份验证登录请求。: Raised just before the WSFAM sends the WS-Federation sign-in request to the STS. 此事件可用于更改登录请求中的参数。You can use this event to change the parameters in the sign-in request. 从 STS 接收 （发出安全令牌） 的登录响应时，将引发以下事件：The following events are raised when a sign-in response (issued security token) is received from the STS: - ： 由 STS 发送的安全令牌从响应中读取之后引发。: Raised just after the security token sent by the STS is read from the response. - ： 验证令牌后引发。: Raised just after the token has been validated. 此事件可用于筛选、 转换或添加到声明主体的声明 () 创建的安全令牌。You can use this event to filter, transform, or add claims to the claims principal () created from the security token. - ： 会话令牌前一刻引发 () 从主体用来设置线程主体的声明和当前用户创建并写入会话 cookie。: Raised just before the session token () created from the claims principal is used to set the thread principal and current user and is written to the session cookie. 使你有机会修改会话令牌或启用或禁用写入会话 cookie。Gives you an opportunity to modify the session token or enable or disable writing the session cookie. - ： 身份验证的末尾之后引发已设置线程主体和当前用户。: Raised at the end of the authentication just after the thread principal and current user have been set. - ： 如果在登录过程中发生异常引发。: Raised if an exception occurs during sign-in. 可以取消请求，并防止异常返回给调用方。You can cancel the request and prevent the exception from being returned to the caller. 登录时从会话中注销或处理 WS 联合身份验证注销清理请求 (wsignoutcleanup1.0) 时，将引发以下事件：When signing out of a session or when processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request (wsignoutcleanup1.0), the following events are raised: - ： 删除该会话以便你执行任何可能依赖于会话的清理或取消注销前引发。: Raised just before the session is deleted to enable you to perform any cleanup that might depend on the session or to cancel sign-out. - ： 删除该会话后引发。: Raised just after the session has been deleted. - ： 如果在注销期间会发生异常引发。可以取消注销，并防止异常返回给调用方。: Raised if an exception occurs during sign-out. You can cancel sign-out and prevent the exception from being returned to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 注销事件不会引发时通过调用注销在 STS方法。The sign-out events are not raised when signing out at the STS by calling the method. 有两种方法登录到使用 WSFAM STS。There are two ways of signing in to an STS using WSFAM. 第一种是通过启用被动重定向通过属性。The first is by enabling passive redirects through the property. 在这种情况下，授权失败请求的资源，而不是返回`401:Access Denied`客户端，WSFAM 响应生成其属性的 WS 联合身份验证登录请求消息并将客户端重定向到 STS 进行检索安全令牌。In this case, when authorization fails on a requested resource, rather than returning a `401:Access Denied` response to the client, WSFAM builds a WS-Federation sign-in request message from its properties and redirects the client to the STS to retrieve a security token. 第二种方法是显式客户端重定向到 STS 通过调用从网页或应用程序中的自定义控件的方法。The second way is to explicitly redirect the client to the STS by calling the method from a web page or custom control in your application. 方法还使用 WSFAM 属性来构造注册请求。The method also uses the properties of the WSFAM to construct the sign-in request. 任何重载方法可用于注销的会话。Any of the overloaded methods can be used to sign out of the session. 这会删除客户端上的会话 cookie。This deletes the session cookie on the client. 不发送到 STS 的 Ws-federation 注销消息 ("wsignout1.0")。It does not send a WS-Federation sign-out message ("wsignout1.0") to the STS. 在 STS 注销，必须使用方法。To sign-out at the STS, you must use the method. WSFAM 通过使用客户端中删除其会话处理 WS 联合身份验证注销清理请求 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")。The WSFAM handles WS-Federation sign-out clean-up requests ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), by deleting its session with the client. 如果未设置注销清理消息中的 wreply 参数，WSFAM 将返回到发送消息的 STS 的绿色复选标记的图像。If the wreply parameter in the sign-out clean-up message is not set, the WSFAM returns an image of a green check mark to the STS that sent the message. 为确认 RP 已完成其注销，STS 可以使用此功能。This feature can be used by an STS as an acknowledgment that the RP has completed its sign-out. WSFAM 公开其功能-例如，其请求处理管道-通过几种特定于任务的方法。The WSFAM exposes its functionality -- for example, its request processing pipeline -- through several task-specific methods. 您可以重写这些方法在派生类中以改变 WSFAM 的行为。You can override these methods in derived classes to alter the behavior of the WSFAM. 要使用该模块必须添加到管道，如下面的 XML 中所示：To be used, the module must be added to the pipeline as in the following XML: ``` ``` 配置完成后，处理 HTTP 请求的各个阶段引发事件。Once configured, the raises events at various stages of processing an HTTP request. ASP.NET 开发人员可以处理这些事件在 global.asax 文件中。ASP.NET developers can handle these events in the global.asax file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wauth 参数是可选的。The wauth parameter is optional. 如果属性设置为`null`或空字符串，wauth 参数不包含在登录请求。If the property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wauth parameter is not included in the sign-in request. 可以通过添加的处理程序替代此设置在每个 HTTP 请求事件。You can override this setting on each HTTP request by adding a handler for the event. 该模块将重定向到安全令牌服务 (STS) 使用 WS 联合身份验证登录请求消息之前，引发此事件。This event is raised just before the module redirects to the security token service (STS) with a WS-Federation sign-in request message. 通过指定 STS属性。The STS is specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 授权失败的 HTTP 请求时引发事件。The event is raised when authorization has failed for an HTTP request. 在引发通过调用事件处理程序委托方法。It is raised from within the event-handler delegate through a call to the method. 可以设置属性控制是否将请求重定向到标识提供程序。You can set the property to control whether the request is redirected to the identity provider. 框架初始化此属性设置为`false`如果用户已经过身份验证。The framework initializes this property to `false` if the user has already been authenticated. 在这种情况下，将属性设置为`true`可能导致循环与 STS。In this case, setting the property to `true` may cause a circular loop with the STS. > [!NOTE] > 事件可用于修改 URL 或取消重定向。The event can be used to modify the URL or cancel the redirect. 若要处理此事件在 ASP.NET 应用程序中的，创建一个名为方法`WSFederationAuthentication_AuthorizationFailed`global.asax 文件中。To handle this event in an ASP.NET application, create a method named `WSFederationAuthentication_AuthorizationFailed` in the global.asax file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从请求处理管道，以确定传入的 HTTP 请求是否包含 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息的窗体 post 调用此方法。This method is invoked from the request processing pipeline to determine whether the incoming HTTP request is a FORM post that contains a WS-Federation sign-in response message. 它将调用重载，并`onPage`参数集`false`以指示在调用不是处理页面时。It invokes the overload with the `onPage` parameter set `false` to indicate that the call did not originate while processing a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从在请求处理管道通过调用重载以确定传入的 HTTP 请求是否为窗体 POST 包含 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息。This method is invoked from the request processing pipeline through the overload to determine whether the incoming HTTP request is a form POST that contains a WS-Federation sign-in response message. 默认实现执行下列任务：The default implementation performs the following: - 如果传入请求是窗体 POST，则会调用方法来确定窗体 POST 是否包含签名响应。If the incoming request is a form POST, it calls the method to determine whether the form POST contains a sign-in response. - 如果传入的请求不是窗体 POST，并且该请求包含 WS 联合身份验证注销清理请求 （wa 参数为"wsignoutcleanup1.0"），则执行注销清理。If the incoming request is not a form POST, and the request contains a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request (the wa parameter is "wsignoutcleanup1.0"), sign-out clean-up is performed. 在这种情况下，调用方法 (参数设置为`true`以指示注销清理) 若要注销的会话。In this case, the method is invoked (with the parameter set to `true` to indicate a sign-out clean-up) to sign out of the session. 这还会导致注销要在引发的事件。This also causes the sign-out events to be raised. 接下来，如果注销清理请求包含 wreply 参数，则客户端定向到返回的 URL方法; 否则为一个绿色复选标记的图像返回给 STS。Next, if the sign-out clean-up request contains a wreply parameter, the client is redirected to the URL returned by the method; otherwise, an image of a green check mark is returned to the STS. 此图像的回执可以用作 sts 注销清理请求已收到并成功处理 RP 的一条确认消息。The receipt of this image can be used by the STS as a confirmation that the sign-out clean-up request was received and successfully processed by the RP.

The WS-Federation sign-in request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个 WS 联合身份验证登录请求，由表示对象。Creates a WS-Federation sign-in request that is represented by a object. 新属性对象设置，如下所示：The properties of the new object are set as follows: - 属性 （wctx 参数） 设置为创建的使用方法参数的值。The property (the wctx parameter) is set to a value created by using the method parameters. - 属性 （wct 参数） 设置为当前时间。The property (the wct parameter) is set to the current time. - 通过使用当前实例的等效属性设置所有其他属性。All other properties are set by using the equivalent properties of the current instance. 传递给方法的参数用于创建 wctx 消息参数。The parameters passed to the method are used to create the wctx message parameter. 这是以下格式的字符串： `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`。This is a string with the following format: `ru=returnUrl&cx=SignInContext&rm=rememberMeSet&id=uniqueId`. - `ru`值设置为的值`returnUrl`参数中传递给该方法并指定该模块应定向到以下成功进行身份验证的浏览器的 URL。The `ru` value is set to the value of the `returnUrl` parameter passed in to the method and it specifies the URL that the module should direct the browser to following successful authentication. 这是存储在 WSFAM 使用的 wctx 字符串中的唯一值。This is the only value stored in the wctx string that is used by the WSFAM. 模块调用方法以处理 WS 联合身份验证登录响应时从 wctx 参数提取此值。The module calls the method to extract this value from the wctx parameter when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response. 不应与指定的 wreply 消息参数混淆属性并提供安全令牌服务 (STS) 应将其响应定向到 rp 的地址。It should not be confused with the wreply message parameter, which is specified by the property and which provides the address at the RP to which the security token service (STS) should direct its response. - `cx`参数设置的值为属性。The `cx` parameter is set to the value of the property. 此属性被公开的从而使您能够设置应 wctx 字符串; 中存储的任何应用程序定义的上下文但是，WSFAM 不公开一个方法以提取此值在响应中。This property is exposed to enable you to set any application-defined context that should be stored in the wctx string; however, WSFAM does not expose a method to extract this value in the response. 如果您的应用程序需要值，则必须提供用于分析 wctx 字符串并处理响应时读取此值的代码。If the value is needed by your application, you must provide the code to parse the wctx string and read this value when processing the response. 您可能会实现此目的通过重写方法。You might accomplish this by overriding the method. - 既不`rm`值，该值设置为值`rememberMeSet`参数，也不`id`参数，该设置的值为参数`uniqueId`WSFAM 使用参数。Neither the `rm` value, which is set to the value of the `rememberMeSet` parameter, nor the `id` parameter, which is set to the value of the `uniqueId` parameter are used by WSFAM. 这些可以设置为任何值。These can be set to any value. 方法从调用方法。The method is called from the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以将 WS 联合身份验证注销请求消息发送到指定的 STS。Call this method to send a WS-Federation sign-out request message to the specified STS. （可选） 可以提供注销请求中的 wreply 参数的值。You can optionally supply a value for the wreply parameter in the sign-out request. 该方法将执行以下操作：The method does the following: 1. 使用指定的参数创建 WS 联合身份验证注销请求消息。Creates a WS-Federation sign-out request message by using the specified parameters. 2. 调用SAM 删除会话 cookie 上的方法。Calls the method on the SAM to delete the session cookie. 3. 重定向到 STS 使用来自第一步的注销请求消息。Redirects to the STS using the sign-out request message from the first step. 没有一个注销事件： ， ，或引发此方法。None of the sign-out events: , , or are raised by this method. 若要删除该会话而无需注销请求消息发送到 STS，调用某个重载方法。To delete the session without sending a sign-out request message to the STS, call one of the overloaded methods. > [!NOTE] > 若要通过使用会话令牌执行被动注销，该模块，依赖于存储在一个值属性登录过程中，有关详细信息，请参阅方法。To perform passive sign-out by using the session token, the module relies on a value that was stored in the property during sign-in, for more information, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从请求处理管道中调用此方法 (方法) 若要成功登录后，出现在依赖方 (RP) 若要将客户端指向页面的 URL。This method is called from the request processing pipeline (the method) to get the URL of the page at the relying party (RP) to direct the client to after successful sign-in. 这是，通常情况下，向其客户端最初请求访问 RP 资源的 URL。This is, typically, the URL of the RP resource to which the client originally requested access. 默认情况下，WSFAM 保存 wctx 消息参数中的返回 URL 时它将 WS 联合身份验证登录请求发送到安全令牌服务 (STS)。By default, WSFAM saves the return URL inside the wctx message parameter when it sends the WS-Federation sign-in request to the security token service (STS). 在实体通过该消息将传递，并且是中的 WS 联合身份验证规范，根据保留的 wctx 参数返回由 STS 发送的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息中未更改。In accordance with the WS-Federation specification, the wctx parameter is preserved across entities through which the message passes and is returned unaltered in the WS-Federation sign-in response message that is sent by the STS. 默认实现从登录响应中的 wctx 参数获取的返回 URL。The default implementation gets the return URL from the wctx parameter in the sign-in response. WSFAM 使用的 wctx 参数的格式的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about the format of the wctx parameter that is used by WSFAM, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从中调用此方法请求处理管道，以确定要处理 WS 联合身份验证注销清理请求后重定向到的 URL 中的方法。This method is called from the method in the request processing pipeline to determine the URL to redirect to after processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request. 如果消息具有 wreply 参数仅调用 (`signOutMessage`参数具有既不是属性`null`也不为空)。It is only invoked if the message has a wreply parameter (the `signOutMessage` parameter has a property that is neither `null` nor empty). 默认实现验证消息中包含的回复 URL (属性) 针对指定的安全令牌服务 (STS) 的地址属性。The default implementation validates the reply URL contained in the message (the property) against the address of the security token service (STS) that is specified by the property. 以下条件必须是有效的回复 url，则返回 true:The following conditions must be true for the reply URL to be valid: 1. 回复 URL 是绝对 URL。The reply URL is an absolute URL. 2. 回复 URL 必须与颁发者相同的方案。The reply URL has the same scheme as the issuer. 3. 回复 URL 必须为颁发者的同一端口。The reply URL has the same port as the issuer. 4. 回复 URL 具有颁发者的同一主机或回复 URL 指定的颁发者的子域。Either the reply URL has the same host as the issuer or the reply URL specifies a sub-domain of the issuer. 如果所有这些条件都为 true，则返回回复 URL （答复）否则，通过指定 URL返回属性。If all of these conditions are true, the reply URL (Reply) is returned; otherwise, the URL specified by the property is returned. 重写此方法以提供更多验证答复 url。Override this method to provide additional validation for the reply URL.

span.span: Handles the event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现 WS-联合身份验证请求处理管道。The method implements the WS-Federation request processing pipeline. 将其添加到中的事件[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]按管道方法。It is added to the event in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline by the method. 该方法执行下列任务：The method performs the following: 1. 调用方法，以确定是否已收到 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息 ("wsignin1.0")。Calls the method to determine whether a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") has been received. 如果响应是 WS 联合身份验证注销清理请求 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")处理消息、 终止请求，并根据请求中的 WS 联合身份验证参数将客户端重定向。If the response is a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up request ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"), processes the message, terminates the request and redirects the client according to the WS-Federation parameters in the request. 如果消息不是登录响应或注销清理请求，该模块只是返回;否则，它执行以下步骤来处理登录响应。If the message is not a sign-in response or a sign-out clean-up request, the module just returns; otherwise it performs the following steps to process the sign-in response. 2. 调用方法来反序列化请求中的对象。Calls the method to deserialize a object from the request. 3. 引发 事件。Raises the event. 您可以取消进一步处理或修改此事件的处理程序中的接收到的安全令牌。You can cancel further processing or modify the received security token in a handler for this event. 一个处理程序通常用于修改或属性。A handler is typically used to modify the or properties. 4. 验证安全令牌，并创建从安全令牌中声明的对象。Validates the security token and creates a object from the claims in the security token. 5. 引发 事件。Raises the event. 您可以取消进一步处理或修改此事件的处理程序中的声明主体。You can cancel further processing or modify the claims principal in a handler for this event. 6. 使用配置的会话身份验证模块 (SAM) 来创建对象。Uses the configured session authentication module (SAM) to create a object. (已配置的 SAM 是返回对象属性。)使用在步骤 5 中返回的声明主体创建的会话令牌。(The configured SAM is the object returned by the property.) The session token is created by using the claims principal returned in step 5. 和属性设置通过使用并的属性步骤 3 中返回，并根据当前时间和令牌生存期由任一指定验证或属性的正由 WSFAM 令牌处理程序集合中的对象。The and properties are set by using the and properties of the returned in step 3 and are validated against the current time and the token lifetime specified by either the or the property of the object in the token handler collection being used by WSFAM. 可以通过配置中指定会话标记处理程序上的令牌生存期[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)元素。The token lifetime on the session token handler can be specified in configuration through the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element. 注意：属性配置为不使用 SAM 的 cookie 处理程序。Note: The property on the cookie handler configured for the SAM is not used. 7. 调用与要写入会话 cookie 的会话令牌的方法。Calls the method with the session token to write the session cookie. 方法将第一个引发事件。The method first raises the event. 您可以更改会话令牌的属性或更改是否应将该 cookie 保留在此事件的处理程序。You can change properties on the session token or change whether the cookie should be persisted in a handler for this event. 引发该事件后，该方法然后将使用 SAM 的 cookie。After the event is raised, the method then writes the cookie using the SAM. > [!NOTE] > 中配置设置不用于编写 cookie。The set in configuration is not used to write the cookie. 8. 调用方法来引发事件。Calls the method to raise the event. 9. 调用方法以获取要将客户端重定向到 RP 页。Calls the method to get the RP page to which to redirect the client. 默认情况下，此方法从登录响应中的 wctx 参数读取返回的 URL。By default, this method reads the return URL from the wctx parameter in the sign-in response. WSFAM 存储返回的 URL 的方式的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about how WSFAM stores the return URL, see the method.

STS 使用它来决定哪些策略要应用的令牌颁发和令牌颁发后将重定向到用户的位置。It is used by the STS to decide what policy to apply for token issuance and where to redirect the user to after token issuance. summary.span: 当模块即将重定向用户标识提供程序时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the module is going to redirect the user to the identity provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以访问和修改请求通过 WS 联合身份验证登录属性。You can access and modify the WS-Federation sign-in request through the property. 例如，可以修改登录消息，若要更改该请求将重定向到标识提供者中的属性。For example, you can modify the property in the sign-in message to change the identity provider to which the request will be redirected. 事件可取消事件，可以设置属性设置为`true`取消重定向。The event is a cancelable event and you can set the property to `true` to cancel the redirect. 默认情况下，事件从内部方法通过调用方法。The event is raised from inside the method through a call to the method. 若要处理此事件在 ASP.NET 应用程序中的，创建一个名为方法`WSFederationAuthentication_RedirectingToIdentityProvider`global.asax 文件中。To handle this event in an ASP.NET application, create a method called `WSFederationAuthentication_RedirectingToIdentityProvider` in the global.asax file. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何添加的处理程序中的事件`Application_Init`global.asax 文件中的事件。The following code shows how to add a handler for the event in the `Application_Init` event in the global.asax file. 代码摘自`FederationForWebApps`示例。The code is taken from the `FederationForWebApps` sample. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For more information about this sample, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的处理程序中的事件 RP 的 global.asax 文件中。The following code shows the handler for the event in the in the global.asax file of an RP. 代码检查是否传入 HTTP 请求包含的 whr 参数，并且，如果是这样，它将此参数设置在 WS 联合身份验证登录请求将发送到 STS。The code checks to see whether the incoming HTTP request contains a whr parameter, and, if it does, it sets this parameter on the WS-Federation sign-in request that will be sent to the STS. 代码摘自`FederationForWebApps`示例。The code is taken from the `FederationForWebApps` sample. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For more information about this sample, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的处理程序事件中的的联合身份验证提供程序 STS 在 global.asax 文件中。The following code shows the handler for the event in the in the global.asax file of a federation provider STS. 代码检查传入的 HTTP 请求是否包含 whr 参数。The code checks to see whether the incoming HTTP request contains a whr parameter. 如果请求包含的 whr 参数，客户端定向到 IP-STS 进行登录;如果没有，客户端定向到主领域发现页上，选择要登录的 IP STS。If the request contains the whr parameter, the client is directed to the IP-STS for sign-in; if not, the client is directed to a home realm discovery page to select the IP-STS at which to sign in. 代码摘自`FederationForWebApps`示例。The code is taken from the `FederationForWebApps` sample. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For more information about this sample, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).

summary.span: 将用户重定向至 属性指定的安全服务标记 (STS)，以使用 WS-Federation 协议获取安全标记。

span.span: Redirects the user to the security token service (STS) specified by the property to obtain a security token using the WS-Federation protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从中调用方法方法从 web 页显示由信赖方 (RP) 或从发出请求时要对被动重定向到标识提供程序执行的事件处理程序委托授权失败。The method is called from the method when the request is issued from a web page presented by the relying party (RP) or from the event-handler delegate to perform a passive redirect to the identity provider on authorization failure. 传递给方法的参数用于创建 wctx 消息参数。The parameters passed to the method are used to create the wctx message parameter. 仅重要参数是`returnUrl`参数。The only significant parameter is the `returnUrl` parameter. 这将指定 RP 应定向到以下成功进行身份验证的浏览器的 URL。This specifies the URL that the RP should direct the browser to following successful authentication. 不应与指定的 wreply 消息参数混淆属性并提供安全令牌服务 (STS) 应将其响应定向到 rp 的地址。It should not be confused with the wreply message parameter, which is specified by the property and which provides the address at the RP to which the security token service (STS) should direct its response. 该方法执行下列任务：The method performs the following: 1. 调用方法，以确保该模块可以颁发有效的登录请求。Invokes the method to ensure that a valid sign-in request can be issued by the module. 2. 调用方法从模块上配置的属性创建登录请求。Invokes the method to create the sign-in request from the properties configured on the module. 3. 调用方法来引发事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 您可以取消重定向或修改此事件的事件处理程序中的登录请求消息。You can cancel the redirect or modify the sign-in request message in the event handler for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wreply 参数是可选的。The wreply parameter is optional. 如果属性设置为`null`或空字符串，wreply 参数不包含在登录请求。If the property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wreply parameter is not included in the sign-in request. STS 使用的 wreply 参数来决定要在令牌颁发后重定向到用户。The wreply parameter is used by the STS to decide where to redirect the user to after token issuance. 不建议这样做会盲目地使用此地址来将用户重定向，因为这种重定向具有安全漏洞的 STS。It is not advisable for the STS to blindly use this address to redirect the user as such redirection has security vulnerabilities. STS （可能通过比较一组预配置的回复地址的目的或通过某些其他方法） 必须验证的答复地址以确保理解广为人知且安全的位置发送答复。The reply address must be validated by the STS (possibly by comparing to a set of preconfigured reply addresses for the purposes or some other method) to make sure that the reply is being sent to understood well known and secure location.

summary.span: 当安全标记已从安全标记服务 (STS) 获得时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a security token has been received from a security token service (STS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以添加事件处理程序之前进行修改，该令牌进行验证。You can add an event handler to modify the token before it is validated. 在事件处理程序可以访问通过安全令牌属性。In the event handler you can access the security token through the property. 事件是可取消事件，您可以设置属性设置为`true`终止 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息的处理的事件处理程序中。The event is a cancelable event, you can set the property to `true` in an event handler to terminate processing of the WS-Federation sign-in response message. 从引发此事件在处理从安全令牌服务 (STS) 收到的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息 ("wsignin1.0") 时的事件处理程序委托。This event is raised from inside the event-handler delegate when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") received from the security token service (STS). 它从 wresult 或 wresultptr 参数在登录响应消息中，但之前验证安全令牌反序列化安全令牌已之后引发。It is raised just after a security token has been deserialized from the wresult or the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message, but before the security token is validated. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#6)]

span.span: Occurs after a security token that was received from the security token service (STS) has been validated but before the session security token is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以添加一个事件处理程序，以修改处理来自安全令牌服务 (STS) 的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息，然后使用它来创建会话令牌时创建的主体。You can add an event handler to modify the principal created while processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message from a security token service (STS) before it is used to create the session token. 在事件处理程序中，您可以访问通过主体属性。In the event handler, you can access the principal through the property. 事件是可取消事件，您可以设置属性设置为`true`终止 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息的处理的事件处理程序中。The event is a cancelable event, you can set the property to `true` in an event handler to terminate processing of the WS-Federation sign-in response message. 从引发此事件在处理从安全令牌服务 (STS) 收到的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息 ("wsignin1.0") 时的事件处理程序委托。This event is raised from inside the event-handler delegate when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") received from the security token service (STS). 只需从 wresult 反序列化的安全令牌后，它将引发或经过验证的登录响应消息中 wresultptr 的参数，和会话安全令牌创建。It is raised just after the security token that was deserialized from the wresult or the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message has been validated, and before the session security token is created. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以添加一个事件处理程序，修改会话令牌，然后将它用于设置线程主体并写入会话 cookie。You can add an event handler to modify the session token before it is used to set the thread principal and is written to the session cookie. 在事件处理程序中，您可以访问会话令牌通过属性。In the event handler, you can access the session token through the property. 您可以指定是否应通过设置写入会话 cookie属性。You can specify whether a session cookie should be written by setting the property. 从引发此事件在处理从安全令牌服务 (STS) 收到的 WS 联合身份验证登录响应消息 ("wsignin1.0") 时的事件处理程序委托。This event is raised from inside the event-handler delegate when processing a WS-Federation sign-in response message ("wsignin1.0") received from the security token service (STS). 只需从 wresult 反序列化的安全令牌后，它将引发或经过验证的登录响应消息中 wresultptr 的参数，和之前声明主体将设置上(并在属性).It is raised just after the security token that was deserialized from the wresult or the wresultptr parameter in the sign-in response message has been validated, and before the claims principal is set on the (and on the property of ). > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要运行会话在引用模式下，Microsoft 建议提供的处理程序global.asax.cs 文件和设置中的事件令牌上的属性中传递属性。To operate sessions in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 这将确保会话令牌引用的每个请求的模式下运行，并且更倾向于只设置会话身份验证模块上的属性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module. ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifWSFAM#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifwsfam/cs/webapplication1/global.asax.cs#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行删除当前会话并引发适当的注销事件的实际工作。This method performs the actual work of deleting the current session and raising the appropriate sign-out events. 该方法将执行以下操作：The method does the following: 1. 调用方法来引发事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 事件处理程序可以提供任何必要的处理之前删除该会话。An event handler can provide any necessary processing before the session is deleted. 属性设置为根据`isIPRequest`参数。The property is set according to the `isIPRequest` parameter. 2. 调用方法在当前会话身份验证管理器来删除会话 cookie。Calls the method on the current session authentication manager to delete the session cookie. 调用方法来引发事件。Invokes the method to raise the event. 3. 如果注销的处理过程中发生错误，将调用方法来引发事件。If an error occurs during sign-out processing, invokes the method to raise the event. 事件处理程序可以取消处理并防止被返回到调用方的异常 An event handler can cancel the processing and prevent an exception from being returned to the caller of 您可以调用方法替换`isIPRequest`参数集`false`以注销会话，而无需执行的重定向。You can call the method with the `isIPRequest` parameter set `false` to sign out of a session without performing a redirect. 该方法最终调用由所有其他重载方法 (与`isIPRequest`参数设置为`false`) 来执行处理注销。The method is ultimately called by all of the other overloaded methods (with the `isIPRequest` parameter set to `false`) to perform the sign out handling. 此方法从调用方法替换`isIPRequest`参数集`true`要注销的会话时它正在处理 WS 联合身份验证注销清理消息 ("wsignoutcleanup1.0")。The method is called from the method with the `isIPRequest` parameter set `true` to sign out of the session when it is processing a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message ("wsignoutcleanup1.0"). 不注销请求消息 ("wsignout1.0") 发送到安全令牌服务 (STS)。No sign-out request message ("wsignout1.0") is sent to the security token service (STS). 注销在 STS 使用 WS 联合身份验证协议，使用方法。To sign-out at the STS using WS-Federation protocol, use the method.

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the wreply parameter to use during WS-Federation sign-out requests ("wsignout1.0").

value.span: 通过注销以下 WS-Federation 协议，该客户端应由安全标记服务 (STS) 的重定向到 URL。

span.span: The URL to which the client should be redirected by the security token service (STS) following sign-out through the WS-Federation protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此属性从初始化`signOutReply`的属性[ <wsFederation> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md)配置文件中的元素。By default, this property is initialized from the `signOutReply` attribute of the [<wsFederation>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/wsfederation.md) element in the configuration file. 它旨在表示 WS-联合身份验证注销请求中的 wreply 参数。It is intended to represent the wreply parameter in a WS-Federation sign-out request. Wreply 参数是可选的。The wreply parameter is optional. 如果属性设置为`null`或注销请求中不包含空字符串，wreply 参数。If the property is set to `null` or an empty string, the wreply parameter is not included in the sign-out request. WSFAM 不直接使用此属性。The WSFAM does not use this property directly. 但是，您可以将其传递给方法时执行 WS 联合身份验证注销你的代码，或者也可以将其传递给方法来创建完整的 WS 联合身份验证注销 URL。However, you can pass it to the method when performing WS-Federation sign-out from your code or you can pass it to the method to create a complete WS-Federation sign-out URL.
